Name: Perfect Fairy
Ingredients: 30 ml Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur
30 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Wine glass .
BLEND all ingredients with 7oz scoop of crushed ice.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: This white drink with the merest tint of absinthe green balances lemon, peach liqueur and lemon juice, rounded and made fluffy with egg white.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2011 by Charles Vexenat for Pernod Absinthe.
Nutrition: One serving of Perfect Fairy contains 214 calories
